description: React component library built on Base UI primitives + Tailwind CSS v4. 53 production-ready components with per-component imports, SSR-safe dark mode, and two visual themes. Powers Neynar Studio.
rules: Import components from their dedicated paths: import { Button } from '@neynar/ui/button'
Use ColorModeInitializer in <head> for SSR-safe dark mode
All components have data-slot attributes for CSS targeting
Use the render prop (not asChild) for component polymorphism
Compound components export multiple parts from the same path
Use cn() utility from '@neynar/ui/utils' for class merging
